name: Fidget Spinner Toy Machine
description:
Can’t get enough of playing claw machine games and want to try something new? Welcome aboard! This new fidget spinner toy claw machine game is the right thing waiting endlessly for you! With a variety of fidget spinners to be collected and played nothing offers best than this stress relieve attraction!

Download the best fidget spinner toy claw machine right now and earn yourself a prize you rightfully deserve! After a tiring day at work get rid of the anxiety and come to play with the vending machine holding your favorite fidget spinner simulator! After all, what better surprise than what a prize machine holds?

The game is free of cost where you are not able to only collect fancy fidget spinners but also will be able to play with them! So why waste money on so many fidget spinners when you can collect them online in this game and play for absolutely free?! Fidget spinner is the ultimate attraction and fun free game for kids to play! Since they love spinners in general they are sure to love this game too!

The game play is as simple as it can get! You have to take to the claw machine and prepare the grabbing crane for action! Then drag the grabbing crane of claw machine into the machine and search for your favorite spinner that you are eyeing on! Immediately grab that spinner and drag it out of the machine!

Once you have grabbed it and taken it out, store it in your fidget spinner inventory or you can choose to play with it if you want!! By pressing the on screen icons and controls you will be able to spin the fidget spinner and can also challenge your friends to see who spins the best! That is the whole attraction too!

The claw machine contains so many bright and colorful kinds of fidget spinners! You just have to choose one and it is all yours! Whatever result you get out of the toy claw machine ought to be the prize that you wanted since all toys are fidget spinner toys! You are not restricted to one, in fact, you the claw machine is full of the fidget spinner toy and you can collect as many as you like as many times as you like!

After collecting multiple fidget spinner toy you can compare with other the variety of spinner simulator that you have and they have! You can create your favorite spinner by collecting different kind of toy claw machine spinners and add to your collection!
This fun free game for kids is filled with love and excitement for your kids!

|||| HOW TO PLAY FIGHET SPINNER TOY CLAW MACHINE:
• Begin to play the game
• Using onscreen controls drag the claw machine crane to the spinner box
• Drop the crane in the toy claw machine
• Select the spinner which you want to grab
• Grab the spinner in crane using the onscreen button
• Drag out the fidget spinner using onscreen controls!
• Bring spinner out and save in inventory
• You can play with the spinner first too
• Collect all spinners and add to collection

|||| FEATURES OF FIDGET SPINNER TOY CLAW MACHINE:
• Multiple spinner simulator collection
• Claw machine simulation
• Fun sound effects and graphics
• Multiple levels
• Safe keeping inventory for spinners
• Easily accessible onscreen controls like the crane
• Stress release game
So collect all the fidget spinners and become the coolest kid in the town!
